title: [K-12] Web-Based Remote Science Learning Platform Integration Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and experience with digital device usage
context.additional_context: Short-term program to cultivate proficiency in using web-based learning platforms integrated with elementary science curricula.

learning_goals: Learners can explain methods for navigating and utilizing LMS-based science content.
Learners accurately apply scientific concepts at least 80% of the time using digital tools (virtual labs, quizzes, etc.) within the platform.

Learners can review at least 3 peers' project codes/documents using GitHub Classroom or Google Docs collaboration features and provide feedback within 24 hours, including at least 1 specific improvement suggestion.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
